legacy.description: Chinese Ambassador to the United Kingdom
legacy.name: Zheng Zeguang

legacy.full_text: China's position on the ongoing #Palestine-#Israel conflict has wide support in the international community. China will continue to work relentlessly with relevant parties to protect civilians, deescalate the situation, and realize peace.

legacy.description: Chinese Ambassador to the United Kingdom
legacy.name: Zheng Zeguang

legacy.full_text:
1/3 Such a pleasure to host a musical recital w/ world-renowned pianist Lang Lang at the Embassy.
Very much appreciate Lang Lang’s wonderful performance, a truly special treat. https://t.co/wNynNCBl0O

legacy.description: Chinese Ambassador to the United Kingdom
legacy.name: Zheng Zeguang

legacy.full_text:
2/3 Music is a bridge connecting civilisations.
As President Xi Jinping points out in his Global Civilisation Initiative, exchange and mutual learning among civilisations can help overcome estrangement, avoid conflicts, promote peace and allow civilisations to flourigh.

legacy.description: Chinese Ambassador to the United Kingdom
legacy.name: Zheng Zeguang

legacy.full_text: 3/3 The Chinese Embassy in the UK will continue to promote cultural exchanges and enhance mutual understanding & friendship between Chinese & British people.

legacy.full_text:
China stands for an open world economy. All restrictions on foreign investment access in the manufacturing sector will be lifted, and high-standard opening up will be further advanced in cross-border service trade and investment.
A look at how #BRI has improved trade connectivity https://t.co/4XjFIsP8hd

legacy.full_text:

A look at China-proposed Global #AI Governance Initiative and find out what China stands for: https://t.co/byNDi83FbQ

legacy.description: Chinese Ambassador to the United Kingdom

legacy.full_text: More good news on China’s economy: Major industrial firms in the countries saw profits surge 11.9% y-o-y in September, registering double-digit growth for the 2nd consecutive month this year. https://t.co/k77kwdEJnL

legacy.full_text:
Meeting w/ governor Gavin Newsom of the US state of California in Beijing, President Xi Jinping noted that the foundation of China-US relations lies among the people, the future lies in the youth, and the vitality lies in sub-national areas.
For more:
https://t.co/mrlPZ8ApYa https://t.co/kJIMbnElRU

legacy.full_text: China is able and ready to invite foreign astronauts to participate in China's space station flight missions, announced a senior official from the China Manned Space Agency (CMSA) at a press conference on Wednesday https://t.co/SJzoASvEJa https://t.co/p1MpASfVva

China is ready to work with other countries to strengthen exchanges and cooperation to jointly explore the universe, peacefully utilise outer space and promote space technology to better benefit the people of the world.

legacy.full_text: The upcoming 6th China International Import Expo #CIIE in Shanghai is ready to welcome visitors from across the world! Over 3,400 exhibitors from 154 countries & regions are expected to attend. https://t.co/mWAb9WXL29

legacy.name: Zheng Zeguang

legacy.full_text:
1/2 President Xi Jinping sent a message to an int’l symposium in commemoration of the 10th anniversary of China’s policy of neighbourhood diplomacy.
https://t.co/Vqf3YA9g5R https://t.co/stARCE3gAY

legacy.description: Chinese Ambassador to the United Kingdom
legacy.name: Zheng Zeguang

legacy.full_text: 2/2 As President Xi said in his message, the basic policy is to pursue friendship & partnership w/ neighbours, and build an amicable, secure & prosperous neighbourhood, highlighting the principle of amity, sincerity, mutual benefit & inclusiveness.

legacy.full_text: As the BRI cooperation enters into a new stage following a decade of development, China further made "promoting green development" one of the eight major steps to support high-quality BRI cooperation https://t.co/r70WJWQb35 https://t.co/xTT9MAlLJJ

Green development is one of the 8 major areas China will focus on to support high-quality #BeltandRoad cooperation. 
A look at how #BRI projects have added to greenness in countries: 
https://t.co/xResbTh30L

legacy.full_text:
Glad to attend the policy dialogue on “defossilising process industries” co-hosted by the Chinese Academy of Sciences & the Royal Society @royalsociety.
Collaboration in research on green, low-carbon devt benefits both China & UK, and is conducive to global sci-tech advancement. https://t.co/KZYjAQDpPn
